mapper.insert:
SELECT seguence.NEXTVAL AS ID FROM DUAL
insert into T_Education ( C_ID, C_DEGREE, C_SCHOOL, C_STIME, C_ETIME, C_SPECIALTY, C_DESCRIPTION, C_RESUME_ID ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{etime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{specialty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resume.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
